# `r emo::ji("package")` hsrtools - functions for health services research

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/INS-Basel/hsrtools.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/INS-Basel/hsrtools)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of hsrtools is to combine and share functions with potential further use in one of the health services research projects at 
the Institute of Nursing Science at the University of Basel. 

## Installation

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r, eval = F}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("INS-Basel/hsrtools")
```
